Immer wenn eine oder mehrere Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, das Spiel verlassen, ohne zu sterben, erhältst du eine Erfahrungsmarke.
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments erzeugst du für jede Erfahrungsmarke, die du hast, einen 1/1 weißen Verbündeter-Kreaturenspielstein.

mainBoard.name: Aang, Airbending Master

rulings.text: All experience counters are identical, no matter how you got them. For example, the last ability will count experience counters that you got from the second ability, from another ability, from another copy of Aang, Airbending Master, and so on.
If the spell you cast has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as the value of X.
Lands exiled this way cannot be played from exile. (Lands that were animated by earthbend will be returned to the battlefield tapped when they're exiled.)

Since you are using an alternative cost to cast a spell from exile this way, you can't pay any other alternative costs. You can, however, pay additional costs, such as kicker costs. If the card has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
The experience counter goes on you, the player, not on Aang. You will keep that counter even if Aang, Airbending Master dies.

To airbend one or more permanents and/or spells means to exile each of those objects. For each card exiled this way, for as long as it's exiled, its owner may cast it from exile by paying {2} rather than paying its mana cost.
Tokens exiled this way will cease to exist and cannot be cast.

mainBoard.text:
When Aang enters, airbend another target creature. (Exile it. While it's exiled, its owner may cast it for {2} rather than its mana cost.)
Whenever one or more creatures you control leave the battlefield without dying, you get an experience counter.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Ally creature token for each experience counter you have.

mainBoard.name: Cloudshift

rulings.text: If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won't return to the battlefield.

Once the exiled permanent returns, it's considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners' graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled permanent will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.
The returned card won't be the target of any spells or abilities that targeted it before. Any spells that don't target, such as Akroma's Vengeance, will still affect it.

When an effect returns the exiled card "under your control," you control it indefinitely after that. In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, any creatures you control from Cloudshift's effect are exiled.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

foreignData.name: 気の技の修行
foreignData.text:
土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とする。それに気の技を行う。（それを追放する。追放されている間、それのオーナーはそれのマナ・コストではなく{2}で唱えてもよい。）
カード１枚を引く。

foreignData.flavorText:
"Un movimiento muy interesante, pequeño".
-Monje Gyatso
foreignData.name: Lección de control del aire
foreignData.text:
Controla el aire en torno al permanente objetivo que no sea tierra. (Exílialo. Mientras esté exiliado, su propietario puede lanzarlo pagando {2} en vez de su coste de maná.)
Roba una carta.

mainBoard.name: Airbending Lesson
mainBoard.text:
Airbend target nonland permanent. (Exile it. While it's exiled, its owner may cast it for {2} rather than its mana cost.)
Draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText: Outside the sanctuary of Ba Sing Se's walls, humble Earth Kingdom villages hope to stave off the news of war for just one more day.

foreignData.flavorText: Par-delà les murs du sanctuaire de Ba Sing Se, les modestes bourgades du Royaume de la Terre espèrent ne pas entendre parler de la guerre ne serait-ce qu'un jour de plus.
foreignData.name: Prairie prospère
foreignData.text:
Ce terrain arrive engagé. Au moment où il arrive, choisissez une couleur autre que le blanc.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou un mana de la couleur choisie.

foreignData.flavorText: Außerhalb der heiligen Mauern von Ba Sing Se hoffen die bescheidenen Dörfer des Erdkönigreichs, die Kunde vom Krieg noch einen weiteren Tag von sich fernhalten zu können.
foreignData.name: Gedeihende Heide
foreignData.text:
Dieses Land kommt getappt ins Spiel. Sowie es ins Spiel kommt, bestimme eine Farbe außer Weiß.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder ein Mana der bestimmten Farbe.

foreignData.flavorText: Al di fuori del riparo rappresentato dalle mura di Ba Sing Se, gli umili villaggi del Regno della Terra sperano ogni giorno che le notizie della guerra non li raggiungano ancora.
foreignData.name: Brughiera Florida
foreignData.text:
Questa terra entra TAPpata. Mentre entra, scegli un colore diverso dal bianco.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o un mana del colore scelto.

foreignData.flavorText: バーシンセーの聖域の壁の外にはつつましやかな土の王国の村々があり、どうかあと一日だけでも戦争の知らせが届かぬように、と願っている。
foreignData.name: 興隆する荒野
foreignData.text:
この土地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。これが戦場に出るに際し、白でない色１色を選ぶ。
{T}：{W}か、その選ばれた色のマナ１点を加える。

foreignData.flavorText: Más allá de la protección de las murallas de Ba Sing Se, los humildes poblados del Reino de la Tierra tenían la esperanza de mantener a raya las noticias de la guerra durante un día más.
foreignData.name: Brezal floreciente
foreignData.text:
Esta tierra entra girada. En cuanto entre, elige un color que no sea blanco.
{T}: Agrega {W} o un maná del color elegido.

mainBoard.name: Thriving Heath
mainBoard.text:
This land enters tapped. As it enters, choose a color other than white.
{T}: Add {W} or one mana of the chosen color.
